mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.shequguanliyuan_uuid_number as shequguanliyuanUuidNumber ,a.shequguanliyuan_name as shequguanliyuanName ,a.shequguanliyuan_phone as shequguanliyuanPhone ,a.shequguanliyuan_photo as shequguanliyuanPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.shequguanliyuan_email as shequguanliyuanEmail ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM shequguanliyuan a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.shequguanliyuan_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.shequguanliyuanUuidNumber},'%')
and a.shequguanliyuan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shequguanliyuanName},'%')
and a.shequguanliyuan_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.shequguanliyuanPhone},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.shequguanliyuan_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.shequguanliyuanEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
